page.title: 17Shopping on Shoreham Beach
page.content: We asked 12 people what they thought about the shops on Shoreham Beach.The questions we asked were:- 1.where the people came from? 2.did they go to the shops every week? 3.how many times they went a week? 4.did the shops satisfy their needs? The answers to our survey were:- 1)9 out of 12 people came from Shoreham 2 people came from Southwick and 1 person came from Mill Hill. 2) 8 people said they went every week, 2 people said that they didn't.2 people said that they went sometimes. 3) 6 people said that they went shopping once a week.1 person said that they went 5 times a week.2 people said that they went every day.1 person said that they went twice a week.2 people said that they went 3 times a week. 4) 9 people said that the shops were
